title: (x) Warming Liquid - Adobe Caslon {Mike Yanega, Yves}
content:
Please help to ID this font   
   
Thanks a lot. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15796.gif)
author: tao

comments.content: I think it's Adobe Caslon, based on the Q.
Before Yves jumps on me, here's my 'proof': ![Adobe Caslon Semibold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051302im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15800.gif)
